data: Take on the role of dedicated teachers of ASH defending the school against waves of mischievous students, strategically deploying a diverse team of specialized teachers to ensure their students successfully graduate with flying colours.
Cloud Dragon is an intense single room boss fight game in the style of Megaman, where players must battle a powerful dragon with lightning fast reflexes and strategic weapon choices.

Hola 1 es un juego de disparos en primera persona donde los jugadores asumen el papel del Jefe Maestro, un supersoldado, que lucha contra una alianza alien√≠gena llamada el Covenant para salvar a la humanidad y al 
universo.
The Dungeon of Rooms is a thrilling roguelike dungeon crawler where players must navigate through a labyrinth of challenging rooms, defeat a variety of enemies, and collect powerful loot to survive.

Pixel Death is a retro-inspired, adrenaline-pumping pixel art game that harkens back to the golden age of DOOM, challenging players to survive relentless hordes of enemies in a visually captivating and nostalgic gaming experience.

A thrilling, 2-player boxing showdown that pits friends and rivals against each other, as they feverishly mash buttons to deliver lightning-fast punches, dodge devastating blows, and strive to become the ultimate champion of the ring.

As the protagonist of An Apple A Day, you play the role of a doctor who must dodge apples (the very thing that's supposed to keep you away) while collecting life-saving medicine, proving that sometimes even the best intentions can lead to some seriously challenging situations!
Navigate a treacherous tropical island maze, evade haunting ghosts, and triumph over the formidable ice Gollum boss to claim victory.
Single Player Top Down Dungeon Crawler
